name: Penguin's Cape
description:
Ping the penguin wakes up in an inside a prison cell in a castle, but soon he realizes, if he stays there he’s going to be eaten alive! Well, maybe not alive, but nevertheless, one most be careful with this kind of situation. Now he has a choice, he can stay there and be eaten by those horrendous walrus, or put on his cape (A metaphorical one) and escape. He’s no match up against the big beasts that guard the castle, but he could use this “smallness” at his advantage.

Now it’s up to you to guide his journey into the shadows, sneak, jump, hide, walk, in order to escape, from the Walrus’ Castle.
